name: Only One Decision
description:
Studio Esagames presents:
Only One Decision

A simple game about finding a friend.
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Credits:

Design, art, concept: Chika
Design, programming, coordination: Esa
Music: Jouni Sopanen
Additional design: たっせー

Source code available at:
https://github.com/mmKALLL/only-one-decision
